Room.Name: Khallazar's Compound
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the eastern edge of Khallazar's compound, near wild vegetation.
Room.LongDescription: Khallazar is not known for his gardening work, but there is a steady drip od acid from his tree house which seems to be feeding the tangle of plants growing to the southeast. Khallazar's Hut is northwest, and a path is southeast of here.
